kala paluwan galoya jathika wanodyana awata athi pradeshaye “kudumberiya” gas winasha kirime hethuwen bidi karmanthayata kanakoka handayi.kudumberiya shaka pathra bidi karmanthaya sandaha wishala washayen yodaganna athara kala paluwan nisa wanodyanayata yabadawa swabhawikawa wawena kudumberiya gas winasha kirima nisa ema pradeshaya parisarika asamathulithathawakata pathwa athi bawa pradeshawasihu pawasathi.wisheshayen galoya mitiyawathe nilgalthalawa kudumberiyawalata prasiddhiyak usulayi.kudumberiya gase shaka pathra saha patta bidi ethima sandaha upayogi kara ganithi.akkara 25,000 k pamana wishala pradeshayaka katayuthu kirimata sitina niladhari pirisa simitha bawin wana aparadha siduwena baw wana sanrakshana departhamenthuwa pawasayi..
